posts.post_content:
Sgc 30 T204 Ramly Tom Reilly

Nice presentable card for the grade. Downgraded by Sgc due to some rust staining on the reverse caused by the tobacco tin that it was stored in for many years. Card originates from of a large Ramly find I had a couple years back.

Tobacco tin mentioned above is included and will ship with the card. Why break em up now, right? :) See pics below!

(SOLD)  - Please drop me an email if interested. 

Thanks all,

[url]andreatny@q.com[/url]
